titleStmt.title: A model of true spiritual thankfulnesse. Delivered in a sermon before the Honourable House of Commons, upon their day of thanksgiving, being Thursday, Feb. 19. 1645, for the great mercy of God, in the surrender of the citie of Chester into the hands of the Parliaments forces in Cheshire, under the command of Sir William Brereton. / By Tho. Case, preacher in Milkstreet London, and one of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Case, Thomas, 1598-1682.

titleStmt.title: A model of true spiritual thankfulnesse. Delivered in a sermon before the Honourable House of Commons, upon their day of thanksgiving, being Thursday, Feb. 19. 1645, for the great mercy of God, in the surrender of the citie of Chester into the hands of the Parliaments forces in Cheshire, under the command of Sir William Brereton. / By Tho. Case, preacher in Milkstreet London, and one of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Case, Thomas, 1598-1682.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ruth Raworth, for Luke Fawne, at the signe of the Parrot in Paul's Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
